function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited scope of research may miss important FM interventions for mitigating indoor respiratory infections","Impact":"Failure to identify effective interventions could lead to continued spread of respiratory viruses in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Broaden the scope of the study to include all relevant FM interventions, not just those initially identified as significant","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research team, academic community","Owner":"Research team, academic community"},{"Description":"Failure to consider all soft service activities as potential sources for respiratory pathogen transmission","Impact":"Overlooking soft service activities may lead to incomplete understanding of infection transmission routes in buildings","Mitigation":"Include all soft service activities in the review and analysis to ensure comprehensive coverage of potential transmission routes","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research team, academic community","Owner":"Research team, academic community"}]}
